pageTitle: Prime Minister’s itinerary for Wednesday, January 29, 2020 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

10:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend the National Caucus meeting.

Room 225A
West Block
Parliament Hill

2:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend Question Period.

Media appearance

7:00 p.m. An interview with the Prime Minister will air on CTV’s Awareness, Acceptance, And Action: A Bell Let’s Talk Day Primetime Special.
